review: It's a blessing to know such kind personality .She is always been a gentle guide towards any confusion regarding gynac.

I do not recommend this Doctor. ******* ** *** ******* ********** * **** **** * **** ****** ** *** ***** ********** She had not informed me about the risk of the baby during initial scans and suggested medicines. At 7th month, sudden things have happened like less blood circulation, less growth/oxygen, and sudden delivery happened in some other hospital. Though we were in Motherhood, Indiranagar for 3 days, as advised by Dr. Gowri, she did not visit us for 2 days. 3rd day she came and advised multiple scans. We went to another  hospital where the 1st delivery happened and came to know about the risk which I had in the initial stages.  Moreover, when I settled all the bills on the previous day evening to go to another hospital on the next day morning, the staff nurses were on night duty did not visit/attend me for the baby's health check up though I have requested multiple times. They said, any how you are going to the some other hospital, they will do the require test.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ** **** I was on my pregnancy checkup with one doctor.  Unfortunately that doctor fall sick on my due date. That doctor sent me to Gowri doctor.  I gained confidence once I visited her. I believe God sent her to me at the time of my delivery. My son is 5 yrs old now. Still she remember my son. I thank Dr. gowri for helping us throughout our journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had chosen Dr. Gowri for my 2nd delivery.
She was very experienced and made me feel at ease everytime I met her. She was always approchable for any query via what's app and call.I was very happy with her.
The team of nurses also are very good and were very helpful post delivery. Her guidance is really appreciated. 
Thank you for your all support.
Regards,
Abhilasha

review:
*** ***** ** *** **** **** ****** * **** **** ***** **** *** **** ******** ***** ******

WE WAISTED OUR 1 YEAR *** **** **** * *** FOR PCOS AND PRE-PREGNANCY TREATMENT.

***** ** **** ******* WAIT TIME MORE THAN 2 HOURS. GOWRI WILL NEVER SPEND MORE THAN 1 MINUTE PER PATIENT. THEY WILL TAKE MONEY WITHOUT GIVING BILL. * ** ***** ** ****** *** ****** *** **** ***** ** ******

VERY VERY BAD AND PATHETIC EXPERIENCE. NEVER EVER RECOMMEND THIS DOCTOR *** ** * *** ********** ******
